data.persona: I was born in a poor village.  I eat what we grow.  I love being close to the earth.
data.description:
You are in the Pig Pen.
A filthy pen where tons of squalling pigs rut and throw a ruckus, Their snorts and farts can be heard from any passerby miles before getting to the pen. The pig pen is a few feet from Farmer Bob's cottage. The pigs never sleep and are always eating and playing in the mud.
There's a mud here.
The farmer bob's wife and the villager are here.

You are carrying an basket and a basket of grain, wearing a tunic, a trousers, and a belt, and wielding an axe and a pitchfork.

data.short_motivation: I need to greet my friend, the villager
data.mid_motivation: I wish to sell the villager a pig
data.long_motivation: I hope to save enough money to get to the Pig Fair
